title: Athletics at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's 200 metres
text:
The men's 200 metres competition of the <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%202015%20Southeast%20Asian%20Games">event</a> at the <a href="2015%20Southeast%20Asian%20Games">2015 Southeast Asian Games</a> was held on 10 June at the <a href="Singapore%20Sports%20Hub">National Stadium</a> in <a href="Singapore">Singapore</a>.
